description:
Subaru visits a convenience store to buy a drink, but its owner is a very shrewd business woman...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 11 - Are to Are to (Ikaryaku) no Seisan
